And regroup they did. A group that looked so lost and so out of shape in terms of defensive structure, suddenly found their feet thanks to a goal from Simranjeet Singh in the  17th minute. A long ball into the striking circle, a quick turn and the tomahawk got India the goal and a foot in the door.Germany werenâ€™t done though. This is a big tournament and there are many Indians who only watch hockey at the Olympics. That is why it is important. That is why it matters a lot. It sends the message that India are back.
